name: ai-text-to-image-backend
description: AI Text-to-Image Backend API - Dockerized Flask Application

scripts.docker:run:dev: docker run -p ${API_PORT:-81}:${API_PORT:-81} -e API_PORT=${API_PORT:-81} -e DEBUG=True -e LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG --name ai-backend-dev ai-text-to-image-backend
scripts.docker:run:prod: docker run -d -p ${API_PORT:-81}:${API_PORT:-81} -e API_PORT=${API_PORT:-81} -e DEBUG=False -e LOG_LEVEL=INFO --name ai-backend-prod ai-text-to-image-backend
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop ai-backend ai-backend-dev ai-backend-prod 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:stop && docker rm ai-backend ai-backend-dev ai-backend-prod 2>/dev/null || true

author: AI Text-to-Image Project
